Our Services

  • General Repairs and Maintenance: Fixing leaks, repairing broken fixtures, and addressing household repairs.
  • Carpentry: Wooden structure installation, repair, and refinishing.
  • Painting and Wall Treatments: Interior and exterior painting, wallpaper installation, and wall texturing.
  • Electrical Services: Wiring, fixture installation, electrical repairs, and troubleshooting.
  • Plumbing Services: Fixture installation, plumbing repairs, leak detection, and pipe replacements.
  • Flooring Installation and Repair: Installation, repair, or replacement of various flooring materials.
  • Kitchen and Bathroom Renovations: Upgrades, remodeling, or renovation of kitchen and bathroom spaces.

About Us

Team of Renovation Specialists

Welcome to The Handyman Crescenta, where craftsmanship meets care. We're your reliable partner for all handyman and renovation needs. Our skilled team is committed to transforming your vision into exceptional results. Let us bring your space to life with precision and expertise, tailored to your style and preferences. Trust us to make your home extraordinary.
